[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@contract-case/case-plugin-base](./case-plugin-base.md) &gt; [MatchingError](./case-plugin-base.matchingerror.md)

## MatchingError interface

Describes the data of an error encountered during a matcher execution. Don't create these manually, use `matchingError` to create them.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MatchingError 
```
